name: Turquoise Ring adorned with a sweet flower blossom,sterling silver
description:
Inspired by the beautiful turquoise stone, I created this blossom flower ring in sterling silver. The setting is completely handmade and decorated with a sterling silver flower and wrapped with a beautiful vine. The elegant and simple blossom rests on the side of the setting. The pretty blue turquoise is set in the handmade bezel. You can see the hammer marks and the work that goes into the ring with the dark patina added to it. This ring will last for generations to come. It is a beautiful piece of Artwork for you to wear. 

Flowers represent to me your own unique beauty. Each flower is different and one of a kind. Wear this ring to remind you of what is important to you in your world and to take the time to look at the flowers.

The beautiful blue turquoise measures approximately 16mm and the setting measures approximately 1 inch. On the back of the ring, my maker's mark, kc is stamped. The ring fits a size 6.5-7 comfortably. 

"Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." Anais Nin

This blossom turquoise ring ships priority mail. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving. It is ready to ship.

Have a beautiful day!

name: Turquoise Ring adorned with butterfly in Sterling Silver
description:
Inspired by the beautiful turquoise stone, I hand fabricated this butterfly ring in sterling silver. 

The setting is completely made by hand and decorated with a sterling silver butterfly. The elegant butterfly rests on the side of the setting. The pretty green , blue and brown turquoise is set in the handmade bezel. You can see the hammer marks and the work that goes into the ring with the dark patina added to it. This ring will last for generations to come. It is a beautiful piece of Artwork for you to wear. 

The butterfly represents your beauty within. And the struggles and transformation that we go through to get to where you are in your life. And the courage to continue on without knowing what the future holds for us. I hope that this ring will remind you that you are a strong beautiful woman when you wear it.

The turquoise measures approximately 20mm (3/4"). On the back of the ring, my maker's mark, kc is stamped. The setting measures approximately 1 inch and the ring measures a 7.5 on the mandrel, but fits a 6.5 to 7 comfortably.


This butterfly turquoise ring ships priority mail with insurance. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving.

Please write with any questions. Thanks so much for shopping handmade!


"Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." Anais Nin


Have a beautiful day!

name: Autumn Turquoise Ring
description:
Inspired by this beautiful piece of turquoise and autumn, I created this one of a kind ring in sterling silver. It is a beautiful piece of jewelry.

The ring is hand built in sterling silver. It has a simple and elegant and a perfect addition to your autumn wardrobe!  The pretty green turquoise is set in the handmade bezel. It is a beautiful piece of Artwork for you to wear and will last generations to come. The turquoise has beautiful veins in it.

Turquoise is a great gift for a friend or loved one. 
If given as a gift, it is said to bring good fortune and protect them from negative energy.

Turquoise carries great wisdom for you. It is an ancient stone and is said to take on the wearer's strengths.

This setting measures 11/16" by 15/16". 

The Ring is a Size 8.

The beautiful Turquoise Ring ships priority mail with insurance. It is ready to ship. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving.

Please write with any questions. Thanks so much for shopping handmade!

"Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." Anais Nin

Handmade with love. 
Built to last generations. 
One of a kind.

Have a beautiful day. Kathryn

name: Green Turquoise Drop on Chain
description:
Simple. Turquoise. Beautiful.

This is a great necklace to wear everyday. 

The Faceted Turquoise Drop is on black sterling silver chain. The drop measures 10mm by 13mm. It comes on a simple 16" sterling silver chain that is blackened. (It is also available on 18" or 20".) You may also request a shiny silver chain instead of the black chain.

Please note this listing is for one necklace. The last picture shows you your options: Green or blue Turquoise, and Shiny or blackened chain.

Please write with any questions.

In note to seller, please let me know:
Green or blue turquoise
Chain: shiny or blackened finish

Thank you for shopping handmade and with kathryncolejewelry.com

Your necklace ships first class.

Have a Beautiful Day!
~Kathryn

name: 3 Circles Necklace
description:
The Three Circles in your life...three important people, three important parts of your life (family, friends, spirituality), three places that remind you of what is important in your life and who you are. The three circles should have your own personal meaning to them. They can be a reminder to you.

The circles measure approximately 3/4" in width and are hand fabricated in thick gage sterling silver. They are formed and soldered together and then hammered on one side and polished on the other side. The hand hammering catches the light and "sparkles". The necklace is 16.5" in length. (16", 18" and 20" are also available).

Three Circles Necklace ship first class free in the US (for a limited time) and will arrive in a simple gift box (made of recycled materials) ready for gift-giving! It is ready to ship.

Please write me with any questions. 

Have a beautiful day!
Kathryn

name: Hibiscus Necklace (Made to Order)
description: “You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible.” ― Deepak Chopra Hibiscus flowers represent delicate beauty. Inspired by the beautiful flowers I see all over Florida, I created this pretty pendent to remind you of your inner strength and that nothing is impossible. Each Hibiscus Flower only lasts for a day or two, but is elegantly beautiful. The Hibiscus flower necklace is completely hand fabricated in sterling silver. (Also available in Brass with a Sterling Silver Chain, not shown in pictures). The flower is created by the Art of cutwork in which I use a jeweler's handsaw to create the intricate details. It measures approximately 1" and is slightly domed. The Hibiscus flower necklace is a piece of Artwork that will last for generations to come. It has my maker's mark stamp on the back. It is Made to Order and takes up to a week to ship. It comes on a simple sterling silver chain. (16", 18", or 20" chain available). Your Hibiscus Necklace will ship in a black gift box (made of recycled material) ready for gift giving. And ships with priority mail shipping with insurance in the US . It is ready to ship. I hope you have a beautiful day! ~Kathryn Thank you so much for shopping handmade! Pin It

name: The Mermaid's Sand Dollar Ring
description:
Inspired by the beach, I designed and created the Mermaid's Sand Dollar ring. It is hand built in sterling silver.

Sand Dollars are said to be coins lost from Mermaids. Recently I was fortunate to find some Sand Dollars after the last storm here. One I found walking on the beach at Sunset. It was a beautiful perfect one. I was extremely excited to find it. I found a handful of others a week later in the water. All of them I will cherish forever. 

This Sand Dollar ring is hand-cut by me in sterling silver. Each one may be slightly different and unique. The ring is heirloom quality and will last for generations to come. On the back of the ring is my makers mark, kc. Each one will be signed on the back. 

The Sand Dollar pendent measures 13/16" in diameter. I will make a limited quantity of these. They are made to order in your size.

Your beautiful Sand Dollar ring ships priority mail in the US. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving.

name: The Mermaid's Sand Dollar Necklace
description:
Inspired by the beach, I designed and created the Mermaid's Sand Dollar necklace in sterling silver. It is hand fabricated. 

Sand Dollars are said to be coins lost from Mermaids. Recently I was fortunate to find some Sand Dollars after the last storm here. One I found walking on the beach at Sunset. It was a beautiful and perfect one. I was extremely excited to find it. I found a handful of others a week later in the water. All of them I will cherish forever. 

This Sand Dollar necklace is hand-cut by me in sterling silver. Each one may be slightly different and unique. The pendent is heirloom quality and will last for generations to come. On the back of the necklace is my makers mark, kc. Each one will be signed on the back.

The Sand Dollar pendent measures 13/16" in diameter and hangs on a sterling silver chain in your choice of length (16", 18" or 20").

Your beautiful Sand Dollar necklace ships priority mail in the US. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving.

Have a Beautiful Day! ~Kathryn

name: Ocean Ring
description:
Standing on the waters edge with my feet in the water I was inspired by the beautiful crystal clear water at the beach and the ripples that you see in the sand. I created this handmade ring in sterling silver by recreating the textures that you see at the beach. 

This ring is handmade in sterling silver and then a beautiful patina is added to increase the detail.

It measures 1/2" in width and available in any size.

Your beautiful Ocean ring ships priority mail in the US. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving. It is made to order in your size and will take 3-7 days to ship.

name: Silver Daisy Necklace (Made to Order)
description:
Inspired by the beautiful flowers of Spring, this daisy necklace is handmade in sterling silver.
The daisy necklace is a sweet and elegant design. The daisy is cut out by hand using a jeweler's handsaw. 

The daisy measures 3/4" in diameter and is slightly domed. It is completely hand fabricated. The daisy comes on a 16" simple sterling silver chain (18" and 20" also available).

Flowers are the universal language of beauty.


This daisy necklace ships priority mail in the US. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving.

Please write me with any questions.


Have a beautiful day! ~Kathryn

name: By the sea Initial Necklace Handmade in Sterling Silver (Made to Order)
description:
Inspired by the sea...these initial necklaces are unique and one of a kind. They remind me of a treasure you may find at the beach.

I created these necklaces with recycled sterling silver. Each one will be unique. I can stamp one lower case initial in the script font on it for you. This listing is for one initial necklace. The pendent measures approximately 3/8". 

Each pendent is attached to a nice sterling silver chain. I have available 16", 18", or 20" chains. 

The necklace is made to order and will take 3-7 days to ship. 

Your necklace will ship to you priority mail and arrive in a simple black box with pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift-giving. 

Thank you for shopping handmade and with kathryncolejewelry.com

Have a beautiful day!

name: Blossom Stackers, Handmade Artisan Jewelry in Sterling Silver (Made to Order)
description:
"When you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for the moment. I want to give that world to someone else. Most people in the city rush around so, they have no time to look at a flower. I want them to see it whether they want to or not."
~Georgia O'Keefe

Wear these tiny blossoms to remind you of what is important to you in your world and to take the time to look at the flowers.


This listing includes Three Blossom Stacker Rings and three spacers. Also available to order is any number of rings.

I handmade this beautiful set of rings in sterling silver. Each flower blossom is cut out by hand with a jeweler's handsaw. The flowers each measure approximately 3/8". And they are set on a thin sterling silver band. I have blackened the silver to give it an antique finish. Your rings will be made for you and may have slight differences.

These rings are made to order and will take 5-7 business days to ship. It ships priority mail in the US.

Please write with any questions.

Visit the rest of my shop here: http://www.kathryncolejewelry.com

name: Sunburst Flower (Medium)/Made to Order
description:
Inspired by my flowers in my garden, I created this sunburst flower necklace in sterling silver.

The Medium Sunburst flower necklace is hand fabricated with love and a handsaw by Kathryn. It is handmade in sterling silver. It measures 1 1/4" by 1 3/8" and is slightly domed. 

It comes on a simple sterling silver chain. (16", 18", or 20" chain available)


The sunburst ships Priority Mail with confirmation in the US. 

The Sunburst Flower is Made to Order and takes up to one week to ship.

name: Sunburst Necklace (Made to Order)
description:
Designed and Hand fabricated by Kathryn, this necklace is striking on. The flower measures 2 1/4" x 2 1/8". It is handcut and pierced with a handsaw in Sterling Silver. Then it is filed, sandpapered and polished to a shiny finish. 

It comes on a simple sterling chain. (available in 16", 18", or 20"). 

This flower is made to order and will take 5-10 business days to ship.

Please write if you need it quickly and i will work with you.

Have a Beautiful Day! Kathryn

name: Blossom Necklace (Made to Order)
description:
I handmade this tiny blossom in sterling silver. It is a sweet simple flower. 

In Japan cherry blossoms are held in the highest esteem. As the season of cherry blossoms blooming are so short, cherry blossoms represent the beautiful, but transient nature of our lives.

Wear these tiny blossoms to remind you of what is important to you in your world and to take the time to look at the flowers.

It is cut out by hand and then domed. It measures approximately 3/8". It comes on a sterling silver chain. Both the flower and the chain are given a blackened finish to give it an antique look. It is also available in a shiny silver finish.

This Necklace is Made to Order and takes 3-5 business days to be made. 

The blossom necklace is available on 16", 18", or 20" chain. 

Please write with any questions. The blossom necklace ships priority mail in the US. It will arrive in a black gift box (made of recycled materials) with pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift-giving!

At checkout please note your choices are:
~blackened or shiny finish
~16", 18" or 20" chain

name: Simple Hoops (XL) in Sterling Silver (Made to Order)
description:
The large hoops will become your favorites to wear everyday. The simple hoops are handmade in sterling silver. They are very lightweight. I wear these hoops everyday. The would be a wonderful gift for your favorite friend or a nice treat for yourself!

The hoops are made with sterling silver 18 gage round wire. They are hand hammered to flatten and to give a texture. Then they are polished to a shiny finish which makes them "sparkle". 

These measure 2 1/8" in diameter approximately. Since they are handmade, the size may vary a little.
Other sizes are available.

These sterling silver hoops ship first class in the US and will arrive in a simple gift box (made of recycled materials) ready for gift-giving! These hoops are ready to ship.

Please write me with any questions.

name: Soulmates Necklace handmade in sterling silver
description:
In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
~Maya Angelou

My Soulmates necklace is handmade with two circles in sterling silver. This is a perfect gift for your soulmate.

Each circle measures approximately 3/8" in width (together 11/16") and are hand fabricated in sterling silver. They are formed and soldered together and then hammered flat. An antique finish is given to them. The necklace is available in 16", 18", and 20" lengths. (Custom sizes are also available).

This necklace could be made with more or less circles also. I have added the listing for One circle necklace here, but I don't have a picture to show it.

This necklace ships priority mail in the US. 

All my jewelry comes in a gift box (made of recycled material) and a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving!

Thank you so much for shopping handmade and with kathryncolejewelry.com

name: Labradorite Flower Ring in Sterling Silver
description:
This flower ring was inspired by the beautiful labradorite and summer. It is built by hand with sterling silver and fine silver. 

I love Labradorite in case you haven't noticed. 
I love the amazing splash of colors that they have. 
The stones seem mystical to me.
And I am drawn to them when I see them.

Labradorite is said to help you find your spiritual wisdom and intuition.

And flowers. I love them too. 
They are quite magical.
Flowers represent your inner beauty. 
I like them to remind you of your beauty inside and out. 

I created this beautiful labradorite ring in sterling silver and fine silver. This labradorite is a dark beautiful color. The setting is completely made by hand. The dark patina and hand finishing compliments the labradorite and gives it an antique feel. 

It is a beautiful ring. On the back of the labradorite ring is my makers mark, kc. The flower on the ring is to remind you that you are beautiful.

The ring setting measures 1 1/4" x 7/8". It is a size 7.5.

This labradorite flower ring ships priority mail with insurance. It will arrive in a gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving. It is ready to ship.

Please write with any questions. I would love to hear from you.

Thanks so much for shopping handmade!

name: The Soul of the Butterfly Labradorite Ring in Sterling Silver
description:
Beautiful Butterflies and Labradorite Ring

This ring was inspired by the beautiful labradorite. It is built by hand with sterling silver and fine silver. 

I love Labradorite in case you haven't noticed. 
I love the amazing splash of colors that they have. 
The stones seem mystical to me.
And I am drawn to them when I see them.

Labradorite is said to help you find your spiritual wisdom and intuition.

And butterflies. I love them too. 
They are quite magical.
Butterflies represent your inner beauty and your soul.
I like them to remind you of your soul's purpose and the journey to find it.

I created this beautiful labradorite ring in sterling silver and fine silver. This labradorite is a dark beautiful color. The setting is completely made by hand. The dark patina and hand finishing compliments the labradorite and gives it an antique feel. 

It is a beautiful ring. On the back of the labradorite ring is my makers mark, kc. The butterfly on the ring is to remind you that you are beautiful.

The ring setting measures 1 3/8" x 1". It fits a size 6. It measures 6 1/4, but because of the wide band it fits a size 6 comfortably.

This butterfly labradorite ring ships priority mail with insurance. It will arrive in a black gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving. It is ready to ship.

Please write with any questions. I would love to hear from you.

Thanks so much for shopping handmade!

name: Hand Hammered Circle Bracelet (Made to Order)
description:
This sterling silver bracelet is great for everyday. The circles are hand hammered on one side and smooth on the alternate side which creates a nice contrast as the bracelet moves around. It features 12-13 (depending on size) circles measuring approximately 3/4" each. It is polished to a shiny finish. The bracelet measures 7.25"-8" including clasp. It closes with a sterling silver lobster clasp and is finished with a 10mm Aquamarine Bead or Fresh Water Pearl (or another bead).

If you are measuring your wrist, make sure that you measure it loosely.

The Hand Hammered Circle Bracelet is handmade and Made to Order. It will take up to a week to ship.

name: Daisy Earrings (XS)
description:
Inspired by a garden.

Simple daisies to adorn your ears. These daisies are handmade in sterling silver. Each is cut out by hand and then domed and attached to a sterling silver post. The daisies measure approximately 1/2".

The daisy posts are available in blackened or shiny sterling silver. Please specify at checkout. They are ready to ship blackened.

Thank you so much for looking and shopping handmade.

Have a Beautiful Day!

name: Daisy Flower Necklace (extra small) handmade in sterling silver
description:
"When you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for the moment. I want to give that world to someone else. Most people in the city rush around so, they have no time to look at a flower. I want them to see it whether they want to or not."
~Georgia O'Keefe

Wear this tiny daisy to remind you of what is important to you in your world and to take the time to look at the flowers.

This pretty little daisy is completely made by hand by me. 
It is hand fabricated in Sterling Silver. I cut out each daisy by hand with a jeweler's handsaw. It is hand hammered and domed. It is then it is blackened. 

The daisy measures 1/2". It comes on a simple 16" sterling silver chain. If you would like a 18" or 20" chain please leave a message in message to seller when you check out. Thank you.

This necklace is made to order and will take 2-7 days to ship. It ships priority mail in the US.

Please write with any questions. Thank you for shopping handmade!

Have a beautiful day!

name: Blossom with Vine Earrings (Made to Order)
description:
My Blossom with Vine Earrings are handmade in Sterling Silver. They were inspired by Japanese cherry blossoms. 

In Japan the cherry blossoms are held in the highest esteem. As the season of cherry blossoms blooming are so short, cherry blossoms represent the beautiful, but transient nature of our lives.

Wear this tiny blossom to remind you of what is important to you in your world and to take the time to look at the flowers.

Each flower blossom is cut out by hand with a jeweler's handsaw. The flower measures approximately 3/8". I have blackened the silver to give it an antique finish. The earrings hang approximately 1". 


These earrings will ship priority mail in the US and arrive in a gift box with a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift-giving. 

These earrings are Made to Order and ship in 5-7 business days.

Please write with any questions. Thank you for shopping handmade.

Have a beautiful day!

name: Simple Hoops in sterling silver
description:
These simple circle earrings are perfect for everyday. They are made with sterling silver round wire that is hand hammered to flatten them. Each one will be unique (and not match perfectly). The circles measure approximately 5/8" and hang down a little more than an inch.

These earring are available in shiny finish or blackened and antiqued finish. Please specify which finish you would like at check-out.

These earrings ship free with first class mail in the US. 

All my jewelry comes in a matte black gift box (made of recycled material) and a pretty sheer ribbon ready for gift giving! They are ready to ship.

Thank you so much for shopping handmade!

Have a beautiful day!

name: Oval Silver Earrings
description:
Inspired by the Southwest.

These are great earrings for the spring and summer. They are handmade in sterling silver. The ovals are hammered to give them a beautiful texture. They are then blackened to add a southwest look to them. The ovals measure approximately 1 3/4" x 1". The earrings hang from the earwire approximately 2".

Your earrings will arrive in a simple black gift box with beautiful sheer ribbon ready for gift-giving. They ship priority mail in the US which takes 2-3 days to get to you.

Thank you so much for shopping handmade and with kathryncole.etsy.com !


And please write with any questions. I would love to hear from you. 
I hope you have a beautiful day!
